api_en

Class CSG.Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • api_en.AddTransformationMethodsToPrototype
      • api_en.CSG.Vertex
  • Enclosing class:
    CSG

    public static class CSG.Vertex
extends AddTransformationMethodsToPrototype
    Represents a vertex of a polygon. Use your own vertex class instead of this one to provide additional features like texture coordinates and vertex colors. Custom vertex classes need to provide a `pos` property `flipped()`, and `interpolate()` methods that behave analogous to the ones defined by `CSG.Vertex`.

      • flipped

        public CSG.Vertex flipped()
        Return a vertex with all orientation-specific data (e.g. vertex normal) flipped. Called when the orientation of a polygon is flipped.

      • getTag

        public int getTag()

      • interpolate

        public CSG.Vertex interpolate(CSG.Vertex other,
                     double t)
        Create a new vertex between this vertex and `other` by linearly interpolating all properties using a parameter of `t`. Subclasses should override this to interpolate additional properties.

      • transform

        public CSG.Vertex transform(CSG.Matrix4x4 matrix4x4)
        Affine transformation of vertex. Returns a new CSG.Vertex
